original_text: And they paid attention to him because for a long time he had amazed them with his magic.
korean_text: 오랫동안 그 마술에 놀랐으므로 그들이 따르더니

sentences.original_text: And they paid attention to him
because for a long time he had amazed them with his magic
sentences.korean_translation: 오랫동안 그가 마술로 그들을 놀라게 했기 때문입니다
